title: Ample Hills Creamery (Gotham West Market)
seo_description: Gotham West Market is a modern space filled with many different food vendors. From Spanish tapas, sushi burritos, and even breakfast ramen, this is a great place to spend an evening with friends or when you just can't decide what you're in the mood for.
content:
Honeycomb Ice Cream

600 11th Ave

walk: 22 minutes

Gotham West Market is a modern space filled with many different food vendors. From Spanish tapas, sushi burritos, and even breakfast ramen, this is a great place to spend an evening with friends or when you just can't decide what you're in the mood for. The real gem in this market is a small outpost of Brooklyn-based creamery, Ample Hills. Their creative flavors and silky consistency are the reason to have ice cream for any meal, year-round.
